channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- MediaPad M3; Mate 9 Pro; P10 Plus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- MediaPad M3; Mate 9 Pro; P10 Plus

item.title: CVE-2018-7992|2024-08-05T06:37:59.654Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- mediapad%20m3%3B%20mate%209%20pro%3B%20p10%20plus
item.description: Mdapt Driver of Huawei MediaPad M3 BTV-W09C128B353CUSTC128D001; Mate 9 Pro versions earlier than 8.0.0.356(C00); P10 Plus versions earlier than 8.0.0.357(C00) has a buffer overflow vulnerability. The driver does not sufficiently validate the input, an attacker could trick the user to install a malicious application which would send crafted parameters to the driver. Successful exploit could cause a denial of service condition.
